scripts.postinstall: npm run setup:circuits && mkdir -p node_modules/@lightprotocol/hasher.rs/dist/browser-fat/es/ 2>/dev/null; cp -f node_modules/@lightprotocol/hasher.rs/dist/hasher_wasm_simd_bg.wasm node_modules/@lightprotocol/hasher.rs/dist/browser-fat/es/ 2>/dev/null; cp -f node_modules/@lightprotocol/hasher.rs/dist/light_wasm_hasher_bg.wasm node_modules/@lightprotocol/hasher.rs/dist/browser-fat/es/ 2>/dev/null; exit 0
scripts.setup:circuits: mkdir -p public/circuits && cp -f node_modules/privacycash/circuit2/transaction2.wasm public/circuits/ 2>/dev/null && cp -f node_modules/privacycash/circuit2/transaction2.zkey public/circuits/ 2>/dev/null && echo '✅ Circuit files setup complete' || echo '⚠️  Circuit files may need manual setup'
